name: C&C
description:
This game was made with LÖVE, during the 72h LÖVE Jam. The theme was Companion.

The goal is to go to right side of the screen.

You can play alone or with a friend.

Controls:

Blue cube : QZD (or AWD)

Green cube: Left, Up and Right

Restart level : R

Leave game : L

Sounds generated using bfxr.

Music generated using Otomata.

Special thanks to:

  • Cocosar07 for his help and letting me know about LÖVE and jams
  • N.B. for the cute cubes design

This is the first game I ever released, have fun!
